author: Jean P. May, Jr.
releaseNotes:
v3.0.43 - Add Delayed baseData update on reboot to catch version change
v3.0.42 - Fix C8 Pro failing compatibility check for Matter
v3.0.41 - source changed for lanSpeed
v3.0.40 - Dynamic memory unit option for freeMem
v3.0.39 - add GB option for freeMem
v3.0.38 - add a passive cloud connection check from the Hub Alerts data
v3.0.37 - add the ZipGateWay Endpoint
v3.0.36 - Allow C8 Pro to pass the version check
v3.0.35 - allow Matter attributes for C-5 & C-7
v3.0.34 - add reboot with log purge, update the rebuild option for 2.3.7.145
v3.0.33 - Use built-in file methods when available
v3.032 - Reboot with Rebuild option
v3.0.31 - Suppress error on extended Zigbee/Matter reads if hub not ready
v3.0.30 - Add Matter attributes
v3.0.29 - HE 2.3.7.x zigbee endpoint change
v3.0.28 - add PAN, extended PAN, and zigbee power level for HE 2.3.6.x and above
v3.0.27 - add lanSpeed (Auto-Negotiated or Fixed 100mbps)
v3.0.26 - Remove the Zigbee Stack check
v3.0.25 - Check attributes for hub startup
v3.0.24 - Re-enable Zigbee Stack Check
v3.0.23 - Change font on Cloud Check if URL is blank or does not contain cloud.hubitat.com
v3.0.22 - Check DNS servers to make at least one is active
v3.0.20/21 - Add cloud connection check
v3.0.19 - 15 minute averages for CPU Load, CPU % and Free Memory
v3.0.18 - add file output option for the html attribute
v3.0.17 - handle html error at startup
v3.0.16 - add connectCapable
v3.0.15 - make sure has SSID before designate Dual mode
v3.0.14 - Fixed US/Arizona timezone format exception
v3.0.13 - timezone string with null
v3.0.12 - add an error trap to baseData
v3.0.11 - date format description change
v3.0.10 - lastUpdated -> lastPollTime
v3.0.9 - fine tuning
v3.0.8 - Fix 500 Error on device create
v3.0.7 - add hubVersion to v2Cleanup, add freeMemoryUnit option
v3.0.6 - delay baseData on Initialize
v3.0.5 - missing zigbeeStatus not handled error
v3.0.4 - Add select option to format the hub restart date/time
v3.0.3 - Add Uptime Descriptors option
v3.0.2 - zigbeeStatus/Status2 mismatch, turn off debug after 30 mins, add Remove Unused attributes
v3.0.1 - Poll4 bug fix
v3.0.0 -Rewrite of the original Hub Information Driver
